text: Fruit punch soda is a soft drink flavored like fruit punch. During the 1960s and 1970s, the Cotton Club Bottling Company bottled a fruit punch soda called Tropical Delight. There is also a Hi-C flashin' fruit punch. Fanta, Jarritos, and Goya Foods also produce a fruit punch soda. ==References== Category:Soft drinks
title: Fruit punch soda
